text: Cut the moulds and the transoms to shape as in the detailed drawings. If you have a wooden floor, you can use 'A' frames fastened to the floor. If not, use a strong horizontal frame that will sit firmly on the ground or concrete floor. I use a heavy old base as in Fig. 2.
